document_data.name: Janya bint Khalil
document_data.mainbody: '''Janya bint Khalil''' was a the eldest daughter of [[Grand Caliph]] [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir]] in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities:
Janya spent the first three years of her life within the [[Royal Harim of Huzuz|Royal Harim]] but was moved to a secret location deep within [[Al-Akara Mountains]] for her own protection. She was to live within the mountains until Khalil fathered a male heir, or named her heir, or until she was of an age to be married. She was able to visit her parents in Huzuz regularly.

Janya and her sister, [[Dalia bint Khalil|Dalia]] were protected by both [[jann]] and elite [[Holy slayer|agents]] of the [[Soft Whisper]].
document_data.Relationships: Janya was the child of Khalil and his most favored wife [[Tanya bint Perijan]]. Her name honored both her mother and grandmother.
